Since the area of a triangle is given by 1/2 base*height, the area of the triangular-shaped house of cards that Zion made is 1/2*40*20 = <<1/2*40*20=40>>40 square centimeters.
If two of his friend also built similar shaped houses, the total area of their triangular-shaped house of cards is 40+40=<<40+40=80>>80 square centimeters.
Together with Zion, they all built triangular-shaped houses of cards with a combined area of 80+40=<<80+40=120>>120 square centimeters.
